```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
library(latex2exp)
```

# Plots results

Read in table
```{r}
df <- fread("results/all.txt")
```

Plot $b^2$ vs $\theta$ for PC2
```{r}
df$D <- as.factor(df$D)
df$label <- paste0("Fst2 ", df$expFst2)

pl <- ggplot(data = df, aes(x = theta, y = b2PC2, color = D)) + geom_point(size=2) + facet_wrap(~label) + theme_bw(base_size = 12) + xlab(TeX("\\theta")) + ylab(TeX("$b^2$")) + scale_color_manual(values = c("cadetblue4", "cadetblue3", "cadetblue1"), name = "D (M * L)")
pl

#ggsave("~/Desktop/b2.png", pl)
```

Plot $b^2$ vs $\theta$ for PC1 
```{r}
df$D <- as.factor(df$D)
df$label <- paste0("Fst1 ", df$expFst1)

pl <- ggplot(data = df, aes(x = theta, y = b2PC1, color = D)) + geom_point(size=2) + facet_wrap(~label) + theme_bw(base_size = 12) + xlab(TeX("\\theta")) + ylab(TeX("$b^2$")) + scale_color_manual(values = c("cadetblue4", "cadetblue3", "cadetblue1"), name = "D (M * L)")
pl
```
